query:
UPDATE projects
            SET
                name = COALESCE($1, name),
                color = COALESCE($2, color),
                updated_at = $3
            WHERE id = $4
            RETURNING
                id               AS "id!: Uuid",
                organization_id  AS "organization_id!: Uuid",
                name             AS "name!",
                color            AS "color!",
                created_at       AS "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>",
                updated_at       AS "updated_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
